experience.description: Building an artificial intelligence technology that revolutionizes customer search for e-commerce retail.

• Crafted vital features for Contacto, a web and Electron based cross-platform omnichannel solution. Resulted in significant user expansion and garnered positive feedback, highlighting Plivo's innovation.
• Spearheaded development of a robust Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system, providing granular control over user permissions and data access.
• Proactively achieved seamless browser compatibility for major browsers, yielding a remarkable 25% decrease in user-reported UI issues.
• Techstack: React, Vue, Sass, Electron, Redis, PubNub, Jenkins

• Successfully launched Societe Generale's inaugural branch in India, SG Mumbai overseeing seamless migrations and optimizations for multiple services ensuring a flawless execution with zero production bugs.
• Actively designed and implemented features across loan processing services using LoanIQ and LoanSAT. achieving higher levels of operational excellence.
• Techstack: Java 11, Spring Boot, Swagger, Angular, SQL, Docker, Autosys

• Enhanced and optimized the App Release Service, responsible for delivering Postman application packages and updates to 15 Million+ users.
• Played a key role in integrating color schemes and new design systems in app.
• Techstack: React, Angular, Node, Express, Electron, SQL, Mongo, Redis

We at Sanrakshak have pledged to provide the utmost safe and secure railway journey to our fellow passengers by attaching our robust and affordable sensors beneath the engine of the train.This provides real-time data about the occurrence of cracks or any kind of faults on the railway line and ultimately offers a holistic end to end solution to the government.
• National Rank 1 at "Sabre Hack 2019", Bengaluru.
• Represented India in the final pitch at "German-Indian Startup Connect 2K18", Munich Germany.
• National Winners of "TATA Grand Indian IoT Challange 2018", Pune.
• Winner of Bootcamp at Indian Institute of Technology, Madras.

A cross-platform application built by our intern team.Technology used: 
• Ionic Framework 
• NodeJS, Yarn 
• HTML, SCSS, TypeScriptERPNext is a fully featured ERP with Financialaccounting, Inventory, Invoicing, Payments and Reports.

award.title: National Rank 1 in SabreHack 2019
award.description: Started among one of the 1434 teams that participated and made to the very top to achieve National Rank 1 in SabreHack 2019. Won a cash prize worth ₹2,00,000.

award.title: Rank 1 in Bootcamp, E-Summit
award.description:
• This venture in E-Summit is studded with the best and most innovative ideas, a small 3-day educational journey with the thrill of a pitching competition at the beginning and the end. 
• The mentors and participants are chosen to complement each other in the best way possible to make the event a spectacular learning experience.
• Fetched National Level Rank 1 and Cash Prize worth 50 Thousand.

award.title: National Rank 3 at TATA Grand IoT Challenge
award.description:
• Built an IoT solution for digital transformation needs that will enable stakeholders in society (Government bodies, Corporate world etc)
• Fetched National Level Rank 3 and Cash Prize worth 1.5 Lakhs.

award.title: Represented India in German-Indian Startup Exchange Program
award.description:
• Represented India in Germany for the Final Pitch among Top 10 Finalists at German-Indian Startup Connect 2K18, in Munich, Germany.
• Organised By German Indian Startup Exchange Program.

award.title: National Top 7 in Master Plan 2K18
award.description:
• Masterplan is the annual business plan competition hosted by IIM Ahmedabad. Masterplan seeks to identify budding entrepreneurs to contribute to India’s buzzing economy.
• It is organized by Entre Cell, in collaboration with The Centre for Innovation Incubation and Entrepreneurship (CIIE) and Red Brick Summit.
• Achieved Top 7 Rank after clearing multiple elimination rounds in National Business Plan Competition by IIM Ahmedabad.

award.title: Top 5 in Facebook Developer Hackathon
award.description:
Developed a mobile application and named it as Medisyst.
• Machine Learning based solution for the prediction of diseases on the basis of Symptoms, Gender and Age.
• It Provides all possible diseases with their percentage of accuracy.
• Secured Top 5 position among all other competitors.

award.title: Rank 1 in Ideathon hosted by OWASP
award.description:
Developed a mobile application and named it as Shashakti - Empowering Nation.
• A Mechanism to deliver government schemes to all the citizen.
• Uses machine learning algorithm to predict the interest of the person and deliver respective schemes on his mobile phone.

award.title: Rank 1 in Hello Web Hackathon
award.description:
Developed a mobile application and named it as Chhotu.
• Chhotu is article summarizer mobile application that can be used to generate the summary of a document provided by the user. 
• It doesn’t use any Machine Learning or Natural Language Processing Techniques, but Regex based string processing to achieve its goal.
• This article summarizer was developed in under 24hrs time bracket during a hackathon competition hosted by Mozilla.
• This mobile application fetched our team Rank 1 in this hackathon.

received.headline: Software Engineer @DocuSign | 5+ years (Frontend) | Expertise in React, Vue, TypeScript
received.related: Rohan was senior to Ritik but didn't manage Ritik directly
received.description: I had the pleasure of working alongside Ritik at Plivo, where his dedication and adaptability were truly impressive. Ritik is a quick learner who consistently met task deadlines with precision and efficiency. His exceptional debugging skills were instrumental in ensuring smooth project execution. Moreover, Ritik's proficiency in React and JavaScript greatly contributed to our team's success. His ability to tackle complex problems with ease reflects his strong technical acumen. I highly recommend Ritik for any role requiring a skilled and diligent professional who delivers results consistently and effectively.

received.headline: Senior UI Engineer | Plivo | DevExp Enthusiast
received.related: Samuel worked with Ritik on the same team
received.description: I've worked with Ritik on some interesting projects. He is a fast learner, an excellent team player and an expert in his niche. He meets timelines and delivers top quality output. He has great knowledge in UI development which includes React, vue, vanilla JS, CSS, etc. He can own an entire feature set independently and deliver things on time.He is attracted to modern tooling and tools. Always tries out new tools that enhances his productivity. It is an excellent experience to work along with him. Also a chill person to work with.Wishing you best of luck in your future endeavours Ritik!

given.headline: Software Engineer @DocuSign | 5+ years (Frontend) | Expertise in React, Vue, TypeScript

given.description: I had the privilege of collaborating closely with Rohan at Plivo, and I'm excited to share my firsthand experience of his remarkable software development abilities. Rohan's adeptness with TypeScript and React shines through in every project he tackles, delivering solutions that are not just reliable and efficient, but also scalable to meet evolving needs.Moreover, Rohan's outstanding communication skills and collaborative nature make him a valuable asset to any team. His ability to cultivate a positive and productive work environment, enhances team dynamics and project outcomes.I wholeheartedly endorse Rohan and am confident in his ability to excel in any endeavour he pursues.

He brings fresh ideas to every project, making him an invaluable asset.
